text: I AM a child of God.
I AM complete in Him.
I AM a friend of Jesus.
I AM alive with Christ.
I AM united with the Lord.
I AM holy and without blame.
I have been chosen by God and adopted as His child.
I AM God’s workmanship, created in Christ to do good works.
I AM complete in Christ.
I AM alive in Christ.
I AM hidden with Christ in God.
I AM alive to God in Christ Jesus.
I AM a citizen of heaven.
I AM born of God.
I have been chosen.
I AM a believer and the light of the Gospel shines in my mind.
I AM blessed with every spiritual blessing in Christ.
I AM the righteousness of God in Christ.
I AM the light of the world.
I AM one with Christ Jesus.
I AM forgiven of all my sins and washed in the Blood.
I AM chosen—holy and blameless before God.
I AM firmly rooted, built up, established in my faith.
I AM redeemed; I AM called of God.
I AM seated in the heavenly places with Christ.
I AM a new creature in Christ.
I AM a member of Christ’s body and a partaker of His promise.
I AM greatly loved by God.
I AM strengthened with all might according to His glorious power.
I AM a friend of Jesus.
I AM free from condemnation.
